root.name: Porsche Challenge
root.description: Porsche Challenge was a very realistic racer, considering the fact it was on Playstation 1. The drvier is forced back when you accelerate, and other details are present and correct.At the beginning of a new game, players are asked to select a character. All of them own a Porsche Boxster. However, they like or dislike each other. The drivers they like might help them, and the drivers they do not like may try to hinder them. There is also a secret driver, called simply Driver X. To unlock Driver X, you had to either :Enter a cheat codeComplete all the championships on the hardest difficultyDriver X had an all black Porsche Boxter, and he could tune cars. He was the best driver in the game as he was liked by all the rivals. This made the game pretty easy on the hardest difficulty.Â
